answers.answer: Check your blood pressure if you can. If its normal then it's not really anything to worry about. I've been dizzy my whole pregnancy. But vision change can be pre eclampsia so just check your pressure just in case.
Yes that exact thing happen to me at work I got dizzy then seen my computer screen all blurry I thought I was going to faint . Idk what it can be but my doctors appt is Friday so ill ask then
ask your doctor about low iron i had similarr issues
It could be a sign of gestational diabetes too.
So i should wait for my next appointment, or go tomorow just in case?
Gestional diabetes yikes I will ask my doc on Friday these days can't go any faster
Ikr my nxt visit is the 29th -.-
Maybe try to be seen this week, blood pressure or diabetes... Both need too be checked.

Yes both need to be checked. It also is possible it's just a pregnancy symptom too.. I had the exacts and happen to me with my first and it was nothing and now the same symptoms with this pregnancy.. Good luck.

question: Ok so since almost two days ago ive been having a blurry vision, that keeps getting on my nervs and some dizziness, what should i do? :(
title: Worried Momie2Be :$
